formula: Continued fraction representation: sin(1) = 1 - 1/(6 + 6/(19 + 20/(41 + ... + (2*n - 1)*(2*n - 2)/((4*n^2 + 2*n - 1) + ... )))). See A074790 for details. - _Peter Bala_, Jan 30 2015
